languages.text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.
languages.original_text: У всех навигаторов на лбу есть третий глаз, позволяющий им вести пустотные корабли сквозь варп. Без навигаторов Империум Человечества не смог бы существовать, так как любые путешествия между звездными системами, кроме самых ближайших, были бы слишком трудны и опасны.

traits.locale_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

languages.text: У всех навигаторов на лбу есть третий глаз, позволяющий им вести пустотные корабли сквозь варп. Без навигаторов Империум Человечества не смог бы существовать, так как любые путешествия между звездными системами, кроме самых ближайших, были бы слишком трудны и опасны.

Alle Navigatoren haben ein drittes Auge auf der Stirn, mit dem sie Raumschiffe durch den Warp leiten können. Ohne die Navigatoren gäbe es kein Imperium der Menschheit, denn das Reisen zwischen allen Sternensystemen wäre zu beschwerlich und gefährlich.
languages.original_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Alle Navigatoren haben ein drittes Auge auf der Stirn, mit dem sie Raumschiffe durch den Warp leiten können. Ohne die Navigatoren gäbe es kein Imperium der Menschheit, denn das Reisen zwischen allen Sternensystemen außer den nächstgelegenen wäre zu beschwerlich und gefährlich.

languages.text: Tous les navigateurs ont sur le front un troisième œil qui leur permet de guider les vaisseaux spatiaux à travers le Warp. Sans les navigateurs, l'Imperium de l'Humanité n'existerait tout simplement pas, car les déplacements entre les systèmes stellaires, hormis les plus proches, seraient trop onéreux et dangereux.
languages.original_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Tous les Navigateurs ont un troisième œil sur le front, qui leur permet de guider les vaisseaux spatiaux à travers le Warp. Sans les Navigateurs, l'Imperium de l'Humanité n'existerait tout simplement pas, car les déplacements entre les systèmes stellaires, hormis les plus proches, seraient trop onéreux et dangereux.

languages.text: 每位导航者额头上都长着第三只眼，可以引导虚空舰通过亚空间。如果没有导航者，人类帝国根本不可能存在。因为星际之间的旅行充满了危险，如果不通过亚空间进行跳跃，人类恐怕只能抵达最近的星系。
languages.original_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 每位导航者额头上都长着第三只眼，可以引导虚空舰通过亚空间。如果没有导航者，人类帝国根本不可能存在。因为星际之间的旅行充满了危险，如果不通过亚空间进行跳跃，人类恐怕只能抵达最近的星系。

languages.text: 航宙士には全員、〈歪み〉を通過するヴォイドシップを導くことのできる第三の目が額にある。航宙士なしに、人類帝国は存在し得なかった。最も近い星系を除いて、その他全ての星系間の移動は、あまりにも負担が大きく、危険だからだ。
languages.original_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士（ナヴィゲイター）には全員、〈歪み〉（ワープ）を通過するヴォイドシップを導くことのできる第三の目が額にある。航宙士なしに、人類帝国は存在し得なかった。最も近い星系を除いて、その他全ての星系間の移動は、あまりにも負担が大きく、危険だからだ。

languages.text: Todos los Navegantes tienen un tercer ojo en la frente que les permite guiar a las naves del vacío por la disformidad. Sin los Navegantes no habría Imperium de la Humanidad, ya que viajar entre sistemas estelares, salvo los más cercanos, resultaría demasiado peligroso y engorroso.
languages.original_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Todos los Navegantes tienen un tercer ojo en la frente que les permite guiar a las naves del vacío por la disformidad. Sin los Navegantes no habría Imperium de la Humanidad, ya que viajar entre sistemas estelares, salvo los más cercanos, resultaría demasiado peligroso y engorroso.

languages.text: Tüm Rotacıların alınlarında üçüncü birer göz bulunur ve bu sayede uçsuz gemilerine öteboyut boyunca rehberlik ederler. İnsan İmparatorluğu varlığını Rotacılara borçludur çünkü onlar olmasaydı en yakın olanlar hariç tüm yıldız sistemleri arasındaki seyahatler aşırı külfetli ve tehlikeli olacaktı.
languages.original_text: All Navigators have a third eye on their foreheads, which enables them to guide voidships through the warp. Without the Navigators there simply would not be an Imperium of Man, for travelling between all but the very closest star systems would be too onerous and dangerous.
